text: Dang youren dui tamen [youtai jiaotu] shuo “nimen dang xinyang an la suo jiang shi de jingdian [“gulanjing”]” shi, tamen bian shuo:“Women zhi xinyang jiang shi women de jingdian.” Tamen bu xinyang cihou jiang shi de jingdian [“gulanjing”], jinguan ta [“gulanjing”] shi zhenli, keyi zhengshi tamen yi you de jingdian. Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen yiqian wei shen me yao wangtu shahai an la de xianzhimen ne? Jiaru nimen shi xinshi.”
